abstract: Democratic Sen Patrick J Leahy is leading fight against attempts to impose constraints on activities of Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board, watchdog agency that investigates nation's security programs; Senate and House intelligence committees have increasingly sought to curtail board's investigation of government practices that affect individual rights.
lead_paragraph: Some in Congress want to restrain the work of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board, which guards against government intrusion into Americans’ lives.

headline.main: U.S. Privacy and Civil Liberty Watchdog Faces Limits in Congress
headline.print_headline: Limits on Privacy Board  Face Challenge in Senate

snippet: Some in Congress want to restrain the work of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board, which guards against government intrusion into Americans’ lives....
